author: John Gorry
text: One of my favourite places to eat carvery. Lovely atmosphere and friendly staff. Ample space for dining.

author: Ursula GB
text: Great food with affordable price, friendly service and a cozy atmosphere.

author: Toan Nguyen
text: Nice and healthy meal, cosy place, kid-friendly, will come again. Loads of parking too. Food: 5 | Service: 5 | Atmosphere: 5

author: Ann Davis
text: Lovely carvery on Sunday. Plenty of food given. Good selection of food. Food: 5 | Service: 5 | Atmosphere: 5

author: Jody Fogarty
text: I had not been here in years but had a great experience! The staff were lovely and really accommodating to our toddlers. I got the steak sandwich and I thought it was lovely! We will definitely be back and recommending to others! Thanks a mill
